Text: RE Electric Power Conference Kevin Ill be happy to speak on LNG in North America at the Electric Power Conference Please forward me the invitation and details when available Harvey Harvey L Harmon Vice President Planning and Analysis El Paso Global LNG Louisiana Street Houston Texas Phone Fax email Original Message From Hyatt Kevin mailtoKevin NRONcom Sent Thursday November PM To Harmon Harvey Subject Electric Power Conference Importance High Hi Harvey As we discussed Im chairman of the Natural Gas Infrastructure subcommittee for the Electric Power conference The conference will be held in St Louis MO March Website is wwwelectricpowerexpocomepcfphtml Primary attendees are electric power plant developers builders operators and equipment suppliers One of our proposed speaking topics is LNG a new role in North American supply A concern among power generators has been the lack of domestic gas supply and pipeline infrastructure to serve growing gasfired electric generation needs The Committee feels LNG can and will play a more a prominent supply role in the near future Im looking for an LNG expert who would be willing to give a minute presentation on the morning of March am They would be speaking with other presenters and then participate in a QA session afterward After you visit the website if could let me know if you are interested in speaking I will have a formal invitation forwarded to you Thanks for the help Kevin Hyatt This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you This email and any files transmitted with it from the ElPaso Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
